= Introduction =

Example usage of iCaptcha


= Example 1 : Using Language=

{{{
//Optional Properties 
Properties props = new Properties(); 
props.put("format", "jpg"); 
props.put("font", "Helvetica"); 
props.put("fontsize", "28"); 
props.put("min-width", "180"); 
props.put("padding-x", "25"); 
props.put("padding-y", "25"); 
OutputStream os = new FileOutputStream("c:/captcha/text.jpg"); 
FactoryLanguageImpl inst=(FactoryLanguageImpl)Producer.forName("org.smx.captcha.impl.FactoryLanguageImpl"); inst.setLanguageDirectory("C:/captcha/lang"); 
inst.setLanguage("RU"); 
inst.setRange(5, 10); //Select words bettween 5-10 letters
Producer.render(os, inst, props);
}}}
